member.name: T:Azure.Mcp.Tools.AzureMigrate.Services.IPlatformLandingZoneService
member.summary: Service interface for platform landing zone operations.
Updates the cached parameters for a platform landing zone.
member.param: The firewall type (azurefirewall, nva, or none).

member.summary: Checks if a platform landing zone already exists for the given context.
member.returns: True if platform landing zone exists, false otherwise.

member.summary: Generates a platform landing zone.
member.returns: The download URL if successful, null otherwise.

member.returns: The path to the downloaded file.
